Description: A Salisbury, Mass.-based company that makes bandages and tape for athletic and medical purposes has agreed to pay $215,340 to settle environmental claims by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency.

Info Source: Contained in a spreadsheet obtained from the agency on October 7, 2020 in response to an open records request. The spreadsheet contains cases from the enforcement database accessible at https://enfo.gaepd.org/Orders/Search
